1x4 with parallel items, but opposite block-flow direction.
All items share 'first-row' Baseline Context. No item shares any column-like Baseline Context.
We have 2 baseline-sharing groups.
The 'align-self' property (orthogonal to the shared context) aligns items in each group along the baseline-axis using the row-like baseline.
